Name: Truecolors
About the game: Truecolors is a game where we have to gather clues to the murder in the ship and get to the bottom of it, and survive the dangers and traps everywhere. Investigate the incident. Being on board as a researcher on a ship that arrives on Mars, you become a detective who gets away from the suspect and investigates the murder because you slept for three days. Be a detective and settle the case safely. Listen to people's testimony, investigate hidden clues and gather information to help solve the case. Survive from the threat. Things will change rapidly after you've done a good job of investigating the case. There are things in the ship that threaten your life. Please be careful where you look suspicious, release any traps you can unlock and move on. Find the secret behind the ship. Look carefully when you're going around the ship. If you search all over the ship, you'll find a record. They may be the information you need. Use this information to solve the puzzle. And then you're going to have another ending. Survive the threat and escape the ship.
